name: Fast Rolling
description: In this game, you have to pass different levels while controlling the ball. Each level contains various obstacles and elements which make the playing process harder. Obstacles are perfectly varied, both static and dynamic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7 Processor: Processor 1.2 Ghz or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 140 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
